Package co.unicauca.microservice.apirest.model.service

Interface iCategoryService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CategoryService
public interface iCategoryService
Service interface for managing Category entities.

  • Method Details

    • getCategories

      List<Category> getCategories()
      Retrieves all categories from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all categories.

    • getCategory

      Category getCategory(Long id)
      Retrieves a specific category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The category with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • getCategoryByName

      Category getCategoryByName(String name)
      Retrieves a specific category by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the category to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The category with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • deleteCategory

      String deleteCategory(Long id)
      Deletes a category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to delete.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the deletion operation.

    • postCategory

      String postCategory(Category category)
      Creates a new category.
      Parameters:
      category - The category object to be created.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the creation operation.

    • putCategory

      String putCategory(Category category, Long id)
      Updates an existing category with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      category - The updated category object.
      id - The ID of the category to update.
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the update operation.

    • categoriesExisting

      List<Category> categoriesExisting(List<Category> categories)
      Ensures that the provided categories exist in the database. If a category does not exist, it is created and added to the list of existing categories.
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories to ensure existence.
      Returns:
      A list of categories with updated IDs (existing or newly created).
